.b-grid-row[data-index='0'] .b-sch-timea.title: Row height
.b-grid-row[data-index='0'] .b-sch-timea.content: Events fill available row height. Drag slider to adjust

.b-sch-color-violet.title: Bar margin
.b-sch-color-violet.content: Bar margin is subtracted from row height when determining event height. Drag slider to adjust

.b-grid-row[data-index='5'].title: Drag to resize
.b-grid-row[data-index='5'].content: Using the RowResize feature, you can resize row height easily
